amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 18, 19, 20, 25, 29, 36, 76, and 94 printed in House Report 114-112. See page D540 of the Congressional Record of May 14, 2015 for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered as en bloc No. 1: 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 18, 19, 20, 25, 29, 36, 76, and 94 printed in House Report 114-112.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A003) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A003) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
